title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Helicopter scene - White House Down
description:
Maybe you have seen the movie White House Down I personally think the scenes where Marine One fly's very low over the Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool from Lincoln Memorial via the Washington Monument to the White House.

I changed the scene a bit and instead of flying to the White House I am flying in the direction of the United States Capitol. During this flight I am using an Airbus H135 due to the fact that the Sikorsky S-92 which is normally used as Marine One is not available for MSFS 2020.

If you also want to give the helicopter a try download the  Airbus H135 from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/discover/helicopter

Airbus H135 flying low over water of the Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool
